name: The friends we built along the way
name_original: The friends we built along the way
description:
Welcome to Pactlon where everybody has a special partner, except you. you are searching for someone to team up with, but the real friend may have been with you all along

solve 3 interesting puzzles with a the help of a robot friend who follows your footsteps even in the most dire situations.

I made this  using python arcade and help from keney's sprites

to start the game unzip the folder, enter it, and click RUN_GAME.py
